title: Sample App
short-descr: Install NASA's Sample App and Library
description: This project installs NASA's Sample App and Library. Since Basecamp uses Electronic Data
Sheets (EDS), the NASA repos have been copied to Basecamp's 'App Store', augmented with
EDS and Basecamp JSON app specs. The CMakeLists.txt files have been modified to match
Basecamp's cFS version. The only code modification is the replacement of
fsw/platform_inc/sample_app_msgids.h so EDS topic IDs are used.
